title: üîäpodcasts
desc: Bitcoin Audible is a podcast that has read and reviewed more Bitcoin articles than any other source. Here it is on Spotify...

msgs.text:
Bitcoin Audible is a podcast that has read and reviewed more Bitcoin articles than any other source. Here it is on Spotify 
https://open.spotify.com/show/16c6WR2znCZM1wveeeJoSz?si=DxepXxY0To-_P0RvLekIpA&dl_branch=1

"What Bitcoin Did" by Peter McCormack is an informative Bitcoin podcast that can be heard anywhere or viewed on YouTube here 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzrWKkFIRS0kjZf7x24GdGg

In the Bitcoin Rapid-Fire podcast by John Vallis, guests come on to talk about Bitcoin: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/0i4SJwrYjxs3Bd5Yqx4Pbw?si=3U1im_LMRH6YJT7dWrWxfA&dl_branch=1

Bitcoin Fundamentals is a collection of podcast episodes on bitcoin hosted by Preston Pysh on "We Study Billionaires," the flagship podcast of The Investor‚Äôs Podcast Network with more than 50 million downloads. On the show, Preston Pysh talks about the fundamentals of bitcoin, investing in bitcoin, news, deep dives and more on interviews with prominent people in blockchain technology. Preston is one of the founders of The Investor‚Äôs Podcast Network. He manages his own portfolio through his own holding company, Pylon Holding Company.
https://www.theinvestorspodcast.com/bitcoin-fundamentals/

"What is Money" podcast by Robert Breedlove. "Asking yourself that all-important question "What is Money?" is the rabbit which will lead you down the proverbial rabbit hole of new inquiries, perspectives on socioeconomic reality, and worldview-shattering revelations. Undoubtedly, it is the single most significant question we can ask ourselves in a world drowning in deception. By engaging in deep conversations with a diversity of deep thinkers from all walks of life, we will doggedly pursue this "rabbit" in our relentless hunt for truth."
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2jAZ0x9H0bRvoNt1xNJWYa9_8_an03h0

"Coin Stories" podcast by Natalie Brunelle. One-on-one interviews with Bitcoin thought leaders:
https://open.spotify.com/show/0YOEwxAR1uIx1a15QpqE0l?si=lke4AyHjTs6aAyfD2Y3NwQ&dl_branch=1
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/coin-stories/id1569130932
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4FyujZmvC84
Great podcast, important and interesting to understand both sides
Ah! I loved #1. Can't wait to listen to this one
Foss is the goat hahaha
MATH

For Christians who love Bitcoin. I liked episode 1 from this link!
https://jesusbitcoinpod.com/

"Bitcoin as a deflationary monetary system" by Jeff Booth and co
https://youtu.be/sP8mLotpvkQ

Untold Stories podcast:
https://blockworks.co/collection/untold-stories/

https://thebiz.pro/

Inside Bitcoin Podcast hosted by Neil Jacobs & Joe Carlasare:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9uJjKyMpCH4XGL39KtMAHw
https://open.spotify.com/episode/7typQ2nE141oQkBAIvORrj?si=bwzL7h2uTXCgcttRRPtRZQ&utm_source=copy-link&dl_branch=1
This anonymous individual happens to sound a lot like me
And he does a show with Guy Swann called shitcoin insider
Walks like a JC, talks like a JC...

Dennis Porter & British HODL on probably the most bullish podcast I've ever listened to. Some tidbits: BoA study shows that $1 into BTC increases the market cap by $100....meaning $1T to BTC makes $5M per coin! Predicts this could happen in as early as 12 months. Another prediction....the stock market itself will trade on the Bitcoin network in the future....BULLISH:
https://youtu.be/QKXceak02Ag
I think price predictions are unreasonable and immoral for popularizers and influencers
It gets people are excited, but because it's just "for fun" there's no repercussion for being wrong

List of podcasts roughly grouped into categories, beginner, intermediate, advanced and specialized:
https://bitcoin-resources.com/podcasts/

Mark Cuban vs Bitcoiners (Mark's audio is horrible but you get the gist of all the topics discussed)
https://youtu.be/VR0psOF6dW0
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lex-fridman-podcast/id1434243584?i=1000538790996

OMG YES. I can't wait to listen to this. Nice find <@!671364216086855720> I love Alex's work. I found the podcast on youtube for those who don't have apple podcasts https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kSbMU5CbFM0
https://anchor.fm/tales-from-the-crypt/episodes/276-Starting-an-exchange-in-Guatemala--onboarding-enterprise-clients--and-freedom-money-with-the-IBEX-Mercado-team-e18vn4n
Marty Bent podcast w/ firm where my brother is at
They're leading efforts in SV
